Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerclasses

Class AmmoPocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerclasses.AmmoPocket
  • public class AmmoPocket
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the ammo available to the player

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAmmo​(java.util.ArrayList<Color> ammo)
      This method adds ammo to the ammo pocket of the player, considering the maximum limit, and handling locally the exceeding ammo
      void fromJson​(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer integer)
      This method is used to deserialize a JSON file into an instance of the class using Jackson.
      java.lang.Integer getAmmo​(Color color)
      This method returns the amount of the ammo of the specified color

      This method removes from the pocket the ammo contained in the ArrayList in input

      This method sets a new value for ammo attribute.

      • getAmmo

        public java.lang.Integer getAmmo​(Color color)
        This method returns the amount of the ammo of the specified color
        Parameters:
        color - is the color which ammo amount is returne
        Returns:
        amount of ammo of color

      • setAmmo

        public void setAmmo​(java.util.EnumMap<Color,​java.lang.Integer> ammo)
        This method sets a new value for ammo attribute.
        It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.
        Parameters:
        ammo - an EnumMap of Color objects associated to Integer objects that will be the new attribute value.

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo​(java.util.ArrayList<Color> ammo)
        This method adds ammo to the ammo pocket of the player, considering the maximum limit, and handling locally the exceeding ammo
        Parameters:
        ammo - is the ArrayList of ammo to add

      • reduceAmmo

        public void reduceAmmo​(java.util.ArrayList<Color> cost)
        This method removes from the pocket the ammo contained in the ArrayList in input
        Parameters:
        cost - is the ArrayList with the ammo to be removed

      • toJson

        public java.util.Map<Color,​java.lang.Integer> toJson()
        This method is used to serialize this class objects to JSON using Jackson.
        Returns:
        the ammo map to be serialized by Jackson.

      • fromJson

        public void fromJson​(java.lang.String value,
                     java.lang.Integer integer)
        This method is used to deserialize a JSON file into an instance of the class using Jackson.
        Parameters:
        value - a String read from JSON that represents a key for this class map attribute.
        integer - an Integer value read from JSON that represents the value associated to the key for this class map attribute.
